verses.roman:
bhojana dekhite cāhe, āsite nā pāre
lāṭhī-hāte bhaṭṭācārya āchena duyāre

synonyms: bhojana—the eating; dekhite cāhe—he wanted to see; āsite nā pāre—could not come; lāṭhī-hāte—with a stick in his hand; bhaṭṭācārya—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; āchena—was; duyāre—on the threshold.
translation: Amogha wanted to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu eat, but he was not allowed to enter. Indeed, Bhaṭṭācārya guarded the threshold of his house with a stick in his hand.
